resources.string: YOU! I want to give u a task. A task to fight our school principal! Why you ask? I want him to know how much we are in a pain right now as students. It's so tiring. So much exams, so much homework. I need your help to fight him And complain about how we are as students. Now go and fight!
What do you do? Swipe up to fight! Swipe Right to defend! Double Tap to Heal!
Hold up, Let me take you on as a refresher!
Wait a minute here! Stop right there! You can't go there
Such a bad student, you shall return to class immedietly
I see you want to complain to me, well too bad, THIS IS MY SCHOOL BY MY RULES!
